LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.general.heading: General
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.shootout.label: Enable shooting out
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.shootout.description: Enables shoots originating within a shield to travel out of the shield
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.shootin.label: Enable shooting at friendly shields
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.shootin.description: Allow colonists to attempt to shoot into friendly shields (for testing, not recommended for normal gameplay!)
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.overlap-passthrough.d: Allows shots and explosions to pass through shields on areas that are overlapping
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.scale-heat.label: Scale damage by shield heat
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.scale-heat.descriptio: Blocking damage requires less power when cold and a lot more power when hot. Also using Centralized Climate Control mod is recommended when using this
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.performance.heading: Performance
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.performance.descripti: Settings relating to performance. Disabling any will improve game performance at the cost of the AI not understanding what is shielded
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.performance.target.la: Enable AI preference to shoot unshielded targets (Impact: Low)
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.performance.target.de: Enabling allows the AI to prefer to shoot at targets that are unshielded
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.performance.cast.labe: Enable AI to attempt to shoot from shielded areas (Impact: High)
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.performance.cast.desc: Enabling allows AI to find shielded areas to shoot from. Disabling will cause the AI to not consider shielding as part of cover calculation
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.performance.verb.labe: Enable AI to check if their shot will hit a shield (Impact: Medium)
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.performance.verb.desc: Enabling allows the AI to check their shotlines. Disabling will cause pawns to shoot friendly shields in combat and may cause hunters to endlessly shoot at shiels while hunting
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.power.heading: Power
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.power.per_tile.label: Power to tile
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.integrity.heading: Integrity
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.thermal.heading: Thermal
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.thermal.label: Enable shield heat
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.thermal.description: Enables shield heat. Can cause shields to malfunction and generate incidents
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.minor_thermal_inciden: Incidents are limited affecting the shield only
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.major_thermal_inciden: Incidents can affect the shield and power network
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.critical_thermal_inci: Incidents can affect the shield, power network, and map
LanguageData.fd.shields.alert.lowpower.label: Shields are offline due to low power
LanguageData.fd.shields.alert.lowpower.description: {0} Shield(s) are offline due to low power. Shields need to be connected to power networks with batteries with atleast {1} stored power to work
LanguageData.fd.shields.incident.offline.body: A shield generator has gone offline
LanguageData.fd.shields.incident.skyfaller.blocked.bo: Falling debris has impacted on a shield and was destroyed
LanguageData.fd.shields.incident.droppod.blocked.body: A drop pod has impacted on a shield and was destroyed
LanguageData.fd.shields.incident.crashpod.blocked.bod: A crashed ship part has impacted on a shield and was destroyed
LanguageData.fd.shields.incident.minor.title: Shield Zzzt!
LanguageData.fd.shields.incident.minor.body: An overheating shield emitter coil had a short circuit draining {0}Wd of energy from the power network.
LanguageData.fd.shields.incident.major.title: Shield breakdown
LanguageData.fd.shields.incident.major.body: An overheating shield emitter coil has broken down and drained {0}Wd of energy from the power network.
LanguageData.fd.shields.incident.critical.title: Shield explosion
LanguageData.fd.shields.incident.critical.body: An overheating shield emitter coil exploded and drained {0}Wd of energy from the power network.
LanguageData.radius.label: Radius
LanguageData.thermal_shutoff.label: Thermal shutoff
LanguageData.thermal_shutoff.description: Prevents damage to the shield emitter coil from excessive heat
LanguageData.charge_internal_battery.label: Charge internal battery
LanguageData.charge_internal_battery.description: Draws power from any connected batteries to charge the internal battery
